response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this remarkable item to you for $750,000. This represents an exceptional saving of $50,000 compared to its true worth, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for us to collaborate and for you to secure a valuable asset at a highly favorable price. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
